name: Hoping Forest
description:
Help the frog to find a new home after seeing the forest being destroyed by human progress and its water invaded by dangerous creatures. Reach the other side avoiding the hazards and dangers. Move the tiles around and find one of the hidden paths that will lead you to your goal.

Hoping Forest is a low poly tile-based puzzle game with a relaxing atmosphere where your goal is to find a safe hidden path for the frog. Enjoy up to 60 levels in 4 different difficulties, each one with 2 possible solutions, while listening to some relaxing lofi music.



Move and rotate the different tiles to create the perfect path for each map. Avoid the hazards while you manage the fixed tiles that will force you to take a specific path. Try to catch files in your way to increase your score, but be aware, there's a limited amount of steps that the frog can do. Or search for a straight and quick path to the other side.



Dive into this relaxing world with some lofi beats and take all the time you need to find that perfect solution you are looking for.
